==Descriptions==
{{Description|Those who bring the praises before King Deshret, who show themselves to be full of wisdom, and who do not fear the darkness shall come to this place and obtain unique gifts here.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}
